# Bath, Basic
## Overview
**Size:** 0.5 ss

**Cost:** 400 gp

**Prerequisites:** None

This standard, sparsely furnished room contains a simple wooden or metal tub and a chamber pot or two, along with some rough wooden benches for seating.
